General.Name: Yibitas Yozgat Isci Birligi Insaat Malzemeleri Ticaret Sanayi AS
General.Description: Yibitas Yozgat Isçi Birligi Insaat Malzemeleri Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. produces and sells cement. It also offers ready mixed concrete and clinker products. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is based in Yerköy, Turkey. Yibitas Yozgat Isçi Birligi Insaat Malzemeleri Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. is a subsidiary of Votorantim Çimento Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.
General.Address: Saray Beldesi Fatih Mahallesi, Yerköy, Turkey, 66920
